Header: 494 unemployed graduates and diploma holders given teaching appointments.
Content: 494 unemployed graduates and diploma holders were given teaching appointmentsat the auditorium of the Sabaragamuwa Provincial Council. The graduates and diploma holders were given teaching appointmentsaccording to the policies of the new government. Accordingly, teachers were recruited to Science, English, Bio SystemTechnology, Chemistry, Physical Science, Bio Science, Accounts, Economics, Sinhala Language and Literature, Business and Accounts, Drama and Performing Arts, Information Technology, Communication and Media Studies. State Ministers W.D.J. Senevirathne,JanakaWakkumburaand Sabaragamuwa Province Governor TikiriKobbekaduwa were present on the occasion.
